intro.description: Just a wanderer who ended up developing web apps

description.text: I'm a 24-year-old and somehow I ended up developing apps.
Besides writing code, I love being outdoors. Most of the time, you'll find me running in the mountains or wandering around with a huge backpack.
I didn’t plan on becoming a developer - it kind of just happened. Even though...

I studied IT at high school, the idea of an outdoor life seemed much more appealing. At university, I ended up living above the Arctic Circle for two years. During those never-ending winter nights, I found myself coding by the glow of my laptop, and I ended up enjoying it.
I like to keep things simple perhaps even minimalistic, whether it's my code or my life. A motto that keeps me grounded, whether I’m debugging for hours or running ultramarathons is
description.quote: "If you don't fail, you ain't even trying."

cards.title: Highschool of tech. Frydek-Mistek

cards.content: Physical education and sport, Not much in field of IT :) Year of Erasmus in Norway, studied Extreme environments and Adventure Knowledge

cards.title: Nord University - Bodo
cards.content: Norwegian language and society, One year programme focused mainly on the language

cards.title: Right now
cards.content: Looking for an IT job - HTML, CSS, JS, React, SASS, Tailwind, MongoDB, Git
